subject: Basketball (College)
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: No. 15 Michigan State committed 20 turnovers, 14 in the second half, and barely survived a 63-60 scare from Louisiana-Lafayette at home Sunday.
snippet: No. 15 Michigan State committed 20 turnovers, 14 in the second half, and barely survived a 63-60 scare from Louisiana-Lafayette at home Sunday.
